landing.title: Practice Management
landing.subtitle: Made Simple
landing.description: The all-in-one platform for mental health professionals. Manage your practice, connect with clients, and deliver care—all from your mobile device.
landing.featuresTitle: Everything You Need in One Place
landing.featuresSubtitle: HIPAA-compliant tools designed for modern healthcare practices
landing.ctaDescription: Join thousands of mental health professionals who trust DocPortal
landing.footer: HIPAA-compliant practice management for mental health professionals

features.schedulingDesc: Clients book appointments 24/7 with automatic reminders and calendar sync. Never miss a session.
features.telehealthDesc: HIPAA-compliant video sessions with one-tap access. No downloads required for clients.
features.complianceDesc: Bank-level encryption, audit logs, and secure data storage. Your practice stays protected.
features.billingDesc: Stripe-integrated payments with automatic invoicing. Get paid faster and easier.
features.clientPortalDesc: Dedicated mobile app for clients. Book, pay, message, and join sessions—all in one place.
features.clinicalNotesDesc: SOAP, DAP, and custom templates. Document sessions quickly with pre-built formats.

provider.description: Here's what's happening with your practice today.

client.description: Manage your appointments, messages, and health information.

messaging.title: Messages
messaging.selectConversation: Select a conversation to start messaging
messaging.encryptedDesc: All messages are HIPAA-compliant and encrypted

booking.title: Book an Appointment
booking.videoDesc: A secure video link will be provided before your appointment
booking.cancelPolicy: Payment will be processed after the appointment. You can cancel up to 24 hours in advance.
booking.selectDateTime: Please select both date and time.
booking.bookedDesc: Your appointment on {{date}} at {{time}} has been confirmed.

billing.title: Billing & Payments
billing.secureDesc: All payments are processed securely through Stripe with bank-level encryption.
billing.hipaaDesc: Your payment information is stored securely and never shared.
